actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to establish in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare the positions of Deputy Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and an additional Assistant Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare in lieu of the Under Secretary and the Assistant Secretary for Administration.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Establishes in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare the positions of Deputy Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and an additional Assistant Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare in lieu of the Under Secretary and the Assistant Secretary for Administration. Makes conforming amendments to the pay rates of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare the positions of Deputy Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and an additional Assistant Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare in lieu of the Under Secretary and the Assistant Secretary for Administration.
